wexpman.servicelayer.services

Interface ExperimentExecutionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExperimentExecutionServiceImpl

    public interface ExperimentExecutionService
    This interface defines methods that must be implemented by any service class intended to provide experiment execution (starting, stopping, etc.) services
    Author:
    Matias Alberto Gavinowich

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isExecuting(ExperimentCaseInfo experimentCase)
      Asks if the given experiment case is executing or not
      void startExecution(ExperimentInfo experiment, ExperimentCaseInfo experimentCase)
      Starts execution of the given (not already executing) experiment case
      void stopExecution(ExperimentInfo experiment)
      Stops execution of the given experiment, i.e.
      void stopExecution(ExperimentInfo experiment, ExperimentCaseInfo experimentCase)
      Stops execution of the given experiment case

    • Method Detail

      • stopExecution

        void stopExecution(ExperimentInfo experiment)
                   throws ExperimentExecutionException
        Stops execution of the given experiment, i.e. stops executing all its experiment cases
        Parameters:
        experiment - the experiment to stop executing
        Throws:
        ExperimentExecutionException - if execution of the given experiment case could not be stopped

      • startExecution

        void startExecution(ExperimentInfo experiment,
                  ExperimentCaseInfo experimentCase)
                    throws ExperimentExecutionException,
                           ExperimentConcurrentAccessException
        Starts execution of the given (not already executing) experiment case
        Parameters:
        experiment - the experiment the given case belongs to
        experimentCase - the experiment case to start executing
        Throws:
        ExperimentExecutionException - if the experiment case could not start executing
        ExperimentConcurrentAccessException - if the given experiment had been updated concurrently
        ExperimentManagerInternalException - if the given case does not belong to the provided experiment

      • stopExecution

        void stopExecution(ExperimentInfo experiment,
                 ExperimentCaseInfo experimentCase)
                   throws ExperimentExecutionException
        Stops execution of the given experiment case
        Parameters:
        experiment - the experiment the given case belongs to
        experimentCase - the experiment case to stop executing
        Throws:
        ExperimentExecutionException - if some experiment cases belonging to the given experiment could not be stopped (some may have been stopped before raising the exception)
        ExperimentManagerInternalException - if the given case does not belong to the provided experiment

      • isExecuting

        boolean isExecuting(ExperimentCaseInfo experimentCase)
                    throws ExperimentQueryException
        Asks if the given experiment case is executing or not
        Parameters:
        experimentCase - the experiment case being queried
        Returns:
        true if the experiment case is executing, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ExperimentQueryException - if the executing status of the given case could not be determined
